subsec.p: ... General philosophy is also a budding field of study although I fear that I may find the views of others in these feilds very intolerable at least initially.

Reading of the phenomenon of hypnosis has lead me to reinforce `objectivism' with `determinism' which is a recurrence of the motivational school re-invigoured by an upgrading of the potential of the properly motivated mind. Which leads me to conclude that Wednesday, although necessarily incomplete, is exhausted.
